short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Prevents code block on the page from being incorrectly translated.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,el,en,en_AU,en_GB,e:
Prevents all code blocks on the page from being translated inappropriately by the translator.
Force the code block font on the page to `Intel One Mono`.
All the above features are optional.
This add-on is completely open source, check it out on [github](https://github.com/aiktb/DontTranslateCode).
long.de,es,fr,ja,ru: Tell the translator not to translate code blocks on web pages, keep them elegant!
